code: import{persistStore}from'redux-persist';import persist from'./modules/reduxPersist';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import rootReducer from'./modules/rootReducer';import rootSagas from'./modules/rootSagas';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var enhancer=applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware);var store=createStore(persist(rootReducer),enhancer);sagaMiddleware.run(rootSagas);export var persistor=persistStore(store);export default store;
